name: Dice
description: This is a dice game intended to heighten the sexual atmosphere and promote foreplay
rules:
Rules are simple, there will be 2 dices, one with actions and the other with body parts.
You just need to do what the dice shows.

name: Randomizer
description: A fun way to remove monotony from your sex life. This game allows you to have fun in random positions
rules:
Easy, this game will show a random position and it's information from our database.
You just need to copy what you see.
